name: wall-frame-full-project
description: Wall Frame Designer - Full Stack Application

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && echo 'Frontend built successfully'
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && echo 'Backend ready for deployment'
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend

author: WallFrame Team
